message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
You're starting strong, but I'm not going down without a fight!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it! Time to make a serious offer
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up without a fight!
You're running out of time, and so am I. It's time to think about a decent deal!
I'm willing to go back to the original split, let's just get this over with!
